get.description: Returns only active cities. Optionally filter by countryCode (e.g. DE).

get.summary: List services (active). Optional filter by category

201.description: User registered. Refresh token is set in httpOnly cookie.

200.description: Login successful. Refresh token is set in httpOnly cookie.
Access token refreshed. New refresh token is rotated and set in cookie.

get.summary: Get or create my provider profile

get.description: Active + not blocked providers. Filters: cityId, serviceKey.

post.description: Creates a request and publishes it immediately (MVP).

get.description: Returns published requests. Optional filters: cityId, serviceKey.

patch.summary: Provider: update my availability settings + weekly schedule

get.summary: Public: list provider slots for UI (DST-safe)
get.description: Generates slots in provider TZ with DST support. Considers blackouts and matched/closed requests. Max range 14 days.

parameters.name: tz
parameters.description: IANA time zone override for UI

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: ISO8601 UTC (inclusive). Filter by startAt >= from

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: ISO8601 UTC (exclusive). Filter by startAt < to

patch.summary: Client/Provider: reschedule booking (creates new booking, cancels old)

post.summary: Client: create booking (must match availability slot)

get.summary: Client: list responses for my request (UI)

role.description: Role: client or provider (admin only via backoffice)

requestedId.description: Requested booking id (the one you asked history for)

currentIndex.description: Index of requestedId in items (0..n-1). -1 if not found

durationMin.description: Optional. If omitted, keep previous durationMin

startAt.description: Start datetime in UTC (must match a returned availability slot)

durationMin.description: Optional. Defaults to 60. Must match slot duration.
